item.title: Pseudoscience
item.description: Pseudosciences are disciplines, fields or beliefs that claim to offer systematic knowledge about the natural world, but which are not based on the scientific method.

item.title: Relativism
item.description: How was Edison’s approach to science and innovation different to Tesla’s? Approaches to science, for Eddison and Tesla, became congruent with approaches to social systems.

This week, in our TOK class, we watched a documentary called The Rachel Divide, featuring a woman who identified as Black although she was born to two white parents.
